invocations.description: Returns the amount of players found in the range distance. Optionally you can add a function to filter those creatures.
invocations.ex:
if paroundfilter('Bubble', function(cre) return cre.hppc < 70 end) >= 1 then
	cast('exura sio
invocations.exDescription: Will sio Bubble if it's on your screen and have less than 70 health percent.
